briefTitle: A Study of TQB3616 Capsules Combined With Fulvestrant Injection in Subjects With Advanced Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Open-label, Multicenter Phase II Study of TQB3616 Capsules Combined With Fulvestrant Injection in Subjects With HR-positive, HER2-negative Advanced Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Overall response rate (ORR) assessed by investigator
